title: Welcome To My Blog!
text: Este es el primer post de este blog. La sensación es abrumadora, de nuevo ante la inmensidad del “lienzo en blanco”

title: Sergio Lois, PhD
text:
Twitter
  
  
    
     LinkedIn
  
  
    
     Github
  

  
  
Experienced and driven bioinformatics scientist with more than twelve years of experience working with genomic data. Strong background in computer programming language, and knowledge of various types of databases. Solid skills in statistics and algorithms. Passionate about data analysis and human biology.






Education





University Master’s Degree in Data Science
Universitat Oberta Catalunya (UOC) | Present
Ph.D in Bioinformatics
Universitat de Barcelona. Parc Cientific de Barcelona | Jul. 2012
Postgraduate degree. Genomic, Proteomic and Bioinformatics
Universitat de Barcelona. Facultat de Física i Química | 2004
Bachelor of Science in Human Biology
Universitat Pompeu Fabra. Facultat de Ciencies de la Salut i de la Vida | Jul. 2003









Experience





Bioinformatics specialist at Sistemas Genómicos (SynLab Group) | Sep. 2014 - Present
Bioinformatician at Vall d’Hebron Research Institute (VHIR) | Jul. 2012 - Aug. 2014
Translational Bioinformatics group lead by Dr. Xavier de la Cruz (xavier.delacruz@vhir.org)
Bioinformatician at Institute of Predictive and Personalized Medicine of Cancer
Tumor progression group lead by Dr. Miguel Angel Peinado (mpeinado@igtp.cat) | Nov. 2008 - Jul. 2012
PhD Student at Biomedical Research Group (IRBB)
Molecular modelling and bioinformatics group lead by Dr. Modesto Orozco | Jul. 2003 - Nov. 2008









Technical Skills






R/Python Programming
Data wrangling and visualization
DBMS (Database Management)
Statistical analysis
Supervised/Unsupervised learning algorithms
Control Version (Git)
Agile (Project Management)










Soft skills






Problem solving
Critical Thinking
Organizational abilities
Commitment & Motivation
Teamwork
